verses.name: Judges 19:26
verses.text: Then came the woman in the dawning of the day, and fell down at the door of the man’s house where her lord was, till it was light.

verses.name: Judges 19:27
verses.text: And her lord rose up in the morning, and opened the doors of the house, and went out to go his way: and, behold, the woman his concubine was fallen down at the door of the house, and her hands were upon the threshold.
